metadata.title: CVE-2023-32573 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In Qt before 5.15.14, 6.0.x through 6.2.x before 6.2.9, and 6.3.x through6.5.x before 6.5.1, QtSvg QSvgFont m_unitsPerEm initialization ismishandled.

criterions.comment: qtsvg-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
